abstract: If you’re in Iran, please share with us how the killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani and its aftermath has affected you and your family.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times has been following the latest developments in Iran and Iraq closely, and we’re hoping to hear from more Iranians about how last week’s killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani and rising tensions with the United States are affecting their day-to-day lives.
